info.title: HMI.API
info.description: This document describe the endpoints to use in the UI to connect with the entire CVS system.

post.summary: Allows a user to authenticate into the API.

requestBody.description: Information of the user who wants to authenticate.

200.description: Returns the user information and the JWT token to use in the authorized endpoints.

400.description: If the username or password is incorrect.

post.summary: Refresh the token for the current user.

200.description: Returns the user information and the JWT token to use in the authorized endpoints

post.summary: Revoke the refresh token for the current user, acts like logout.

requestBody.description: The refresh token that should be revoked. if it's not specified, it will automatically look for the "refresh-token" cookie in the request.

400.description: If the token is empty in the cookie and in the request message.

401.description: If the requester user is unauthorized to perform this action.

post.summary: Send a SignalR notification for Logs.

200.description: Success

200.description: Returns list of all available logs.

200.description: The log details.

200.description: Returns the data for the specified module.

404.description: If the module for the specified id does not exist.

200.description: Returns the current operation status.

get.summary: Get process status for the module.

get.summary: Get all sensors for an specified module.

200.description: Returns the sensor for the module.

post.summary: Create a new sensor for the specified module.

404.description: If the sensor for the specified id does not exist.

get.summary: Get configuration for the specified sensor.

202.description: If the sensor configuration was saved.

404.description: If the sensor for the specified id does not exist.

put.summary: Send a request to vision module to validate and update the new reference.

202.description: If the calibration is valid and updated.

404.description: If the sensor for the specified id does not exist.

delete.summary: Send a request to vision module to clear the reference calibration configured for the sensor.

404.description: If the sensor for the specified id does not exist.

post.summary: Send a request to vision to provide feedback of the current calibration.

202.description: If the calibration is valid and updated.

404.description: If the sensor for the specified id does not exist.

get.summary: Get all users registered. Only users with admin role can perform this action.

200.description: Returns list of all users registered and its detailed information.

401.description: If the requester user is unauthorized to perform this action.

post.summary: Register a new user into the system, only users with admin role can create new users.

400.description: If the username its already registered.

401.description: If the requester user is unauthorized to perform this action.

get.summary: Get the user information by its identifier. Only authenticated users can perform this action.

200.description: he detailed information about the specified user.

401.description: If the requester user is unauthorized to perform this action.

404.description: If the user id was not found.

put.summary: Update the information of a specified user. Only authenticated users can perform this action.

202.description: If the user was update successfully.

400.description: If the username its already registered.

401.description: If the requester user is unauthorized to perform this action.

403.description: If is changing the username for a Default user.

404.description: If user id was not found.

delete.summary: Delete the current logged user or if the current user has admin role, it deletes the specified user.

202.description: If the user was deleted successfully.

401.description: If the requester user is unauthorized to perform this action.

404.description: If the user id was not found.

403.description: If deleting default users or a different user than the logged.

post.summary: Reset the user password. Only authenticated users can perform this action.

400.description: If old password does not match.

401.description: If the requester user is unauthorized to perform this action.

404.description: If user id was not found.

post.summary: Reset the user password, only users with admin role can create new users.

202.description: If the user was update successfully.

401.description: If the requester user is unauthorized to perform this action.

404.description: If the user name  was not found.

username.description: Gets or sets the username of the user who wants to be authenticated.

password.description: Gets or sets the password of the user who wants to be authenticated.
